data.actual_result: the keyboard opens then closes by itself
data.expected_result: the keyboard should only open and not close since it doesn't have closing function there
data.short_description: when clicking on the "Enter server name" text box before the keyboard automatically opens it opens then closes the keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - scroll down the servers list and click on the "+" icon - click create server then click on the server name text box before the keyboard opens - observe
